maml:description.maml:para: Get Datastore objects by name,ID,or filter from the VMWare Rest API. Supports wildcards and handles case sensitivity issues.

et Datastore objects by name,ID,or filter from the VMWare Rest API. Supports wildcards and handles case sensitivity issues. Able to return more than 1000 objects by working around the current limitation of the REST APIs.

maml:Description.maml:para: FQDN of server to connect to
name of the datastore, case sensitivity not required. Supports wildcard character *.
ID of vm, or leave this and vmID blank to get a full list
Array[string] of folders to filter on
Datacenters that must contain the datastore
FQDN of server to connect to
name of the datastore, case sensitivity not required. Supports wildcard character *.
ID of vm, or leave this and vmID blank to get a full list
Array[string] of folders to filter on
Datacenters that must contain the datastore

name of the host, case sensitivity required
name of the cluster to obtain host list from, case sensitivity required

specific api section to select from Currently cis, appliance, content, api, vcenter
many of the section allow you to narrow down to a specific item in a section by some kind of ID, you do need to review the docs to find out what ID .. or jsut guess until you get it right

maml:description.maml:para: Get VM objects by name from the VMWare Rest API. Supports wildcards and handles case sensitivity issues.

Get details about vm or a list of vms from VMWare Rest API. Supports wildcards and handles case sensitivity issues. Able to return more than 1000 objects by working around the current limitation of the REST APIs.

maml:Description.maml:para: FQDN of server to connect to
name of the VM, case sensitivity not required. Supports wildcard character *.
ID of vm, or leave this and vmID blank to get a full list
name of host to return list of VMs from, case sensitivity required
ID of host to return list of VMs from. Overrides host parameter if also specified.
Name of cluster to return list of VMs from (able to return more then 1000 VMs), case sensitivity required.
ID of cluster to return list of VMs from (able to return more then 1000 VMs.) Overrides cluster parameter if specified.
Add this switch to output detailed contents of the VM
FQDN of server to connect to
name of the VM, case sensitivity not required. Supports wildcard character *.
ID of vm, or leave this and vmID blank to get a full list
name of host to return list of VMs from, case sensitivity required
ID of host to return list of VMs from. Overrides host parameter if also specified.
Name of cluster to return list of VMs from (able to return more then 1000 VMs), case sensitivity required.
ID of cluster to return list of VMs from (able to return more then 1000 VMs.) Overrides cluster parameter if specified.
Add this switch to output detailed contents of the VM

dev:type.maml:name: List of VM objects based on parameters specified.
